briefTitle: A Community Dance Intervention Engaging Breast Cancer Survivors in a Middle-income Country
officialTitle: "My Body, My Rhythm, My Voice": a Community Dance Intervention Engaging Breast Cancer Survivors in Physical Activity in a Middle-income Country
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in participants' physical activity levels
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* BCS at least six months post treatment completion
* More than 18 years of age
* Living in Bogotá
* Willing to attend the program and the assessments

Exclusion Criteria:

* The presence of metastatic disease and other health conditions for which community physical activity was contraindicated
